title: educational institution logo font
content:
Hi guys,

Anyone can help with this font?  
Sorry for the rather bad quality of the second line of text as it was taken from a photo.

Cheers!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612014517im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_5540.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [sample.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612014517/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_42.jpg) | 88.85 KB |
author: Adam C.

comments.content:
Have you tried using "What the font"?  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612014517/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/ "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/")

I inserted the image there and it came up with Dialog Light  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dialog/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130612014517/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dialog/light/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/dialog/light/")

Close match but not perfect.

No offense meant to WTF, but Renko already got the perfect match (Eva). Most of the time a group of experts will beat the tools.

- Mike Yanega
